photo-caption: Did anyone else get the feeling that RTD was maybe just a little bit in love with the Doctor? I know that the show is his baby and it wouldn’t be around without him, but it would have been nice if the Doctor didn’t keep ending up representing perfect, utopian, non-violent wisdom. Or at least more interesting. Like this scene. It would have been a great time to discuss what death looked like when you were 906 years old and had outlived everybody you ever cared about, what the Doctor thought of human’s meagre lifetimes, what an old man and a young Time Lord thought of their approaching deaths. But no, we just get some platitudes about how wonderful the Doctor is and how therefore he should consider maybe not dying.
